Package org.codehaus.mojo.buildmetadata

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDefinePropertyMojo  
    BuildEnvironmentMetaData  
    HostNameMojo
    Retrieve current hostname and place it under a configurable project property
    JavaInformationMojo
    Set the java properties which contain the information about java runtime, java specification etc.
    MavenMetaDataMojo
    Get maven-metadata which means the version of Maven the active profiles.
    MetaDataMojo
    Retrieve the metadata Java, Java OPTS, operation system, maven information and provide it as properties accessible in the project.
    MetaDataRenderer
    The renderer.
    MetaDataReport
    Retrieve current username and place it under a configurable project property
    OsInformationMojo
    Set the os properties which contain name, family, version and architecture of the operation system.
    UserNameMojo
    Retrieve current username and place it under a configurable project property
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JavaEnvironment
